efotraits.description: Reason by which a person encounters a health service; useful to classify cases when the encounter is due to circumstances other than a disease or injury. This may happen (a) when a person who may or may not be sick encounters the health services for some specific purpose, such as to receive limited care or service for a current condition, to donate an organ or tissue, to receive prophylactic vaccination (immunization), or to discuss a problem which is in itself not a disease or injury; or (b) when some circumstance or problem is present which influences the person's health status but is not in itself a current illness or injury.

efotraits.label: Malabsorption
efotraits.description: Impaired ability to absorb one or more nutrients from the intestine.

efotraits.label: number of non-cancer illnesses, self-reported
efotraits.description: Number of non-cancer illness occurrences in an individual, as reported by the individual.

efotraits.label: Iridocyclitis
efotraits.description: A type of anterior uveitis, in which there is Inflammation of the iris and the ciliary body.

efotraits.label: Eczematoid dermatitis
efotraits.description: Eczema is a form of dermatitis that is characterized by scaly, pruritic, erythematous lesions located on flexural surfaces. [PMID: 32412211]

efotraits.label: total knee arthroplasty
efotraits.description: A surgical procedure in which the knee joint is replaced by a prosthetic implant.

efotraits.label: dentures
efotraits.description: Dentures (also known as false teeth) are prosthetic devices constructed to replace missing teeth, and are supported by the surrounding soft and hard tissues of the oral cavity. Conventional dentures are removable (removable partial denture or complete denture). However, there are many denture designs, some which rely on bonding or clasping onto teeth or dental implants (fixed prosthodontics).

efotraits.label: leukocyte quantity
efotraits.description: The amount of a leukocyte. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: number of cancers, self-reported
efotraits.description: Number of cancer occurrences in an individual, as reported by the individual.

efotraits.label: comparative body size at age 10, self-reported
efotraits.description: Description of an individual's body size at age 10 compared to average, as reported by the individual.

efotraits.label: Hematuria
efotraits.description: The presence of blood in the urine. Hematuria may be gross hematuria (visible to the naked eye) or microscopic hematuria (detected by dipstick or microscopic examination of the urine).

efotraits.label: insulin resistance
efotraits.description: diminished effectiveness of insulin in lowering plasma glucose levels

efotraits.label: medical procedure
efotraits.description: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

efotraits.label: nap during day, self-reported
efotraits.description: Having a nap during the day, as reported by an individual.

efotraits.label: clinical history
efotraits.description: Is an information entity about the material's (i.e., the patient's) medical record as background information relevant to the experiment.

efotraits.label: household income
efotraits.description: A demographic parameter indicating the amount of earning made by a family.

efotraits.label: family history of prostate cancer
efotraits.description: A reported family history of prostate cancer in one or more family members.

efotraits.label: Inguinal hernia
efotraits.description: Protrusion of the contents of the abdominal cavity through the inguinal canal.

efotraits.label: Cholecystitis
efotraits.description: The presence of inflammatory changes in the gallbladder.

efotraits.label: seeing a general practitioner for nerves, anxiety, tension or depression, self-reported
efotraits.description: Seeing a general practitioner for nerves, anxiety, tension or depression, as reported by an individual.

efotraits.label: cleft lip
efotraits.description: Congenital defect in the upper lip where the maxillary prominence fails to merge with the merged medial nasal prominences. It is thought to be caused by faulty migration of the mesoderm in the head region.

efotraits.label: Moderate albuminuria
efotraits.description: The presence of moderately increased concentrations of albumin in the urine, defined as and albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR) of 30 to 299 mg/gm (3.4 to 34 mg/mmol). [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR: Eurenomics_fschaefer] [PMID: 30571025]

efotraits.label: blood insulin amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a insulin (human) when measured in blood. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: Nasal polyposis
efotraits.description: Polypoidal masses arising mainly from the mucous membranes of the nose and paranasal sinuses. They are freely movable and nontender overgrowths of the mucosa that frequently accompany allergic rhinitis. [PMID: 18728843]

efotraits.label: seeing a psychiatrist for nerves, anxiety, tension or depression, self-reported
efotraits.description: Seeing a psychiatrist for nerves, anxiety, tension or depression, as reported by an individual.

efotraits.label: self-reported trait
efotraits.description: Characteristics of an individual that are reported by the individual, usually to medical staff, including via questionnaires, rather than observed or measured directly by medical staff.

efotraits.label: Hypercholesterolemia
efotraits.description: An increased concentration of cholesterol in the blood. [HPO_CONTRIBUTOR: gcarletti]

efotraits.label: Colonic diverticula
efotraits.description: The presence of multiple diverticula of the colon.

efotraits.label: Abdominal pain
efotraits.description: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) and perceived to originate in the abdomen.

efotraits.label: urine potassium amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a potassium atom when measured in urine. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: diaphragmatic hernia
efotraits.description: A congenital or acquired weakness or opening in the diaphragm which allows abdominal contents to protrude into the chest cavity; congenital diaphragmatic hernias are caused when the embryonic diaphragm fails to fuse. [ NCI ]

efotraits.label: Umbilical hernia
efotraits.description: Protrusion of abdominal contents through a defect in the abdominal wall musculature around the umbilicus. Skin and subcutaneous tissue overlie the defect.

efotraits.label: prostate specific antigen amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a prostate-specific antigen when measured in anatomical entity. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: serum urea amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a urea when measured in blood serum. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: Hiatus hernia
efotraits.description: The presence of a hernia in which the upper part of the stomach, i.e., mainly the gastric cardia protrudes through the diaphragmatic esophageal hiatus.

efotraits.label: Hallux valgus
efotraits.description: Lateral deviation of the great toe (i.e., in the direction of the little toe).

efotraits.label: reticulocyte amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a reticulocyte. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: serum IgE amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a IgE immunoglobulin complex, circulating when measured in blood serum. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: Chest pain
efotraits.description: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the chest.

efotraits.label: Oral ulcer
efotraits.description: Erosion of the mucous mebrane of the mouth with local excavation of the surface, resulting from the sloughing of inflammatory necrotic tissue.

efotraits.label: Thrombophlebitis
efotraits.description: Inflammation of a vein associated with venous thrombosis (blood clot formation within the vein).

efotraits.label: Hypoglycemia
efotraits.description: A decreased concentration of glucose in the blood.

efotraits.label: blood immunoglobulin amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a immunoglobulin complex. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: Tinnitus
efotraits.description: Tinnitus is an auditory perception that can be described as the experience of sound, in the ear or in the head, in the absence of external acoustic stimulation.

efotraits.label: serum creatinine amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a creatinine when measured in blood serum. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: sex hormone-binding globulin
efotraits.description: A glycoprotein migrating as a beta-globulin. Its molecular weight, 52,000 or 95,000-115,000, indicates that it exists as a dimer. The protein binds testosterone, dihydrotestosterone, and estradiol in the plasma. Sex hormone-binding protein has the same amino acid sequence as ANDROGEN-BINDING PROTEIN. They differ by their sites of synthesis and post-translational oligosaccharide modifications.

efotraits.label: level of serum globulin type protein
efotraits.description: The amount of a globulin type when measured in blood serum. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute_location]

efotraits.label: thyroid stimulating hormone amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a thyroid stimulating hormone. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: Abnormality of the skeletal system
efotraits.description: An abnormality of the skeletal system.

efotraits.label: Myopia
efotraits.description: An abnormality of refraction characterized by the ability to see objects nearby clearly, while objects in the distance appear blurry.

efotraits.label: appendectomy
efotraits.description: Procedure to remove the appendix.

efotraits.label: deep vein thrombosis
efotraits.description: The formation or presence of a blood clot (THROMBUS) within a deep vein in the lower extremity

efotraits.label: recurrent
efotraits.description: Episodes of disease that occur in individuals who have already had the disease.

efotraits.label: Abnormal circulating lipid concentration
efotraits.description: Any deviation from the normal concentration of a lipid in the blood circulation.

efotraits.label: Thrombocytopenia
efotraits.description: A reduction in the number of circulating thrombocytes.

efotraits.label: eye inflammation
efotraits.description: an inflammation in the eye(s)

efotraits.label: insulin-like protein amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a insulin-like protein. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: family history of breast cancer
efotraits.description: A reported family history of breast cancer in one or more family members.

efotraits.label: adipose amount
efotraits.description: The amount of a adipose tissue. [AUTO: patterns/patterns/entity_attribute]

efotraits.label: suntan
efotraits.description: An induced skin pigment ( MELANIN) darkening after exposure to SUNLIGHT or ULTRAVIOLET RAYS. The degree of tanning depends on the intensity and duration of UV exposure, and genetic factors.

efotraits.label: Abnormality of skin pigmentation
efotraits.description: An abnormality of the pigmentation of the skin.

efotraits.label: knee injury
efotraits.description: Injury to a knee.

efotraits.label: Back pain
efotraits.description: An unpleasant sensation characterized by physical discomfort (such as pricking, throbbing, or aching) localized to the back.

efotraits.label: ease of getting up in the morning, self-reported
